About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello my name is Gustavo, I'm a frontend web developer from Guatemala and everything I've learned about web development has been on my own by online courses and a scholarship obtained in 2019 by Platzi and Facebook Developer Circles, as a specialized web developer in React.

I've worked with technologies and programming languages such as JavaScript, PHP, Node, WordPress, HTML, Bootstrap, and Sass. I am currently studying software development at Galileo University and I'm still studying online courses to learn more about backend.

if you want to know more about me, I invite you to visit my social networks.
